Metadata.Title: 10.5.4 Send Peripheral Logs to Secure Storage

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 10.5.4
==Policy Statement==
Send peripheral logs to secure storage.
==Policy Purpose==
Logs should be backed up to a secure location promptly to prevent tampering.
==Related Guidance==
* [[099fe70b-15a6-45e4-84a8-95d9d98e9581|Send Logs to a Remote Server]]
